settings.title: BioSteel Is Back and Stronger Than Ever: A Message from the New Owner
settings.text: There has been some confusion and misinformation circulating in the market about BioSteel's financial status. I want to address this directly and clearly: BioSteel is not bankrupt, and it is absolutely not going bankrupt. While the brand did face challenges under its previous leadership, I, Dan Crosby, took ownership of BioSteel in December 2023 and have since turned it around. BioSteel is now on a path of growth, success, and innovation.

settings.text: There has been some confusion and misinformation circulating in the market about BioSteel's financial status. I want to address this directly and clearly: BioSteel is not bankrupt, and it is absolutely not going bankrupt. While the brand did face challenges under its previous leadership, I, Dan Crosby, took ownership of BioSteel in December 2023 and have since turned it around. BioSteel is now on a path of growth, success, and innovation.

BioSteel’s Bright Future

Under Dan Crosby’s leadership, BioSteel is stronger than ever. We continue to innovate, providing clean, healthy hydration for athletes and active individuals, while maintaining the trust we’ve built over the years.

 

Final Word

BioSteel is NOT Cwench. Don’t be misled by false claims. BioSteel continues to provide athletes with the highest quality hydration and sports nutrition products, backed by integrity, science, and transparency. Trust BioSteel—the brand that’s been setting the standard in hydration since day one.
